lead_paragraph: Lawyer Ron, who won six races in a row before finishing 12th in the Kentucky Derby, will have surgery today to remove a small chip from his right hind ankle, keeping him out of the Preakness.
snippet: Lawyer Ron, who won six races in a row before finishing 12th in the Kentucky Derby, will have surgery today to remove a small chip from his right hind ankle, keeping him out of the Preakness.
